infos.value: King Oelde and Lord Mont have escaped through the rear gates.
Damn!
Lord Sterne... Do not despair.
Surely King Oelde has a plan.
Do not talk as if you know how I feel!
Ah...
Forgive me, Master. I just...
Don't forget, I was abandoned too. By my own father...
I had not forgotten.
Have you ever thought ill of your father?
At first my heart was ruled by nothing but hatred. However...
Now... I think naught of it at all.
Why is that?
Because I was taken in by you, Lord Sterne.
I met you because I was abandoned. I'd say I was pretty lucky, wouldn't you?
Then please return to the castle. Don't waste the precious luck you've found.
Hah hah hah! Shed your terror, my lord.
I have no intention of throwing my life away.
You came here in order to live?
Of course. A master always wishes to put on a show for his apprentice.
Hah. Hahaha...
Hah hah hah!
Ready for a challenge? He who kills the most wins!
I'm always game for some friendly competition. Beware, I will give it my all!
